It is a safe place to learn. I had no trouble walking around campus by myself.
There are many types of clubs on campus.
For the first to weeks there are a bunch of activities that students can do to win prizes.
Hang out with friends by going to the movies and going out to eat.
The food could have been better.
It was a great place to live and have fun.
The teachers here try to make sure you understand the subject you are studying.
Don't be afraid to be yourselves and ask for help if you need it.
It is a great place to learn and make new friends. The teachers and staff members will help you with anything you need help with.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {45388=The campus provides free Wi-Fi so Internet games shouldn't be an issue, and I've heard the classes I wish to attend have great professors. The State Fair is also held on campus grounds which last from August 9-19 in celebration of the schools 110th anniversary. Along with attendance, the activities present are expected to be fun like movie nights, all sorts of games, and clubs., 43666=The State Fair is held every year in August for 10 days, Art Club, and History Club as well as many others I'm not fond of., 156741=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students If you are interested in attending college but have not decided on a degree, this is a good college to attend due to their multiple options. The courses encourages you work word hard and stay dedicated at school. Bang for the buck If you are struggling with finacial needs, this is a good college to attend. It offers many scholarship opportunities. If you are a theatre major, you can try out obtain a theatre scholarship which will pay for you school. This school also excepts A+ and you can obtain pell grants through the state to pay for you college. Am enjoying being here This college has many activities going on. They often have a movie night for new releases and Texas Holden Tournament to when great prizes. They only have men’s and women’s basket ball as a sport which is a downfall but they regularly have activities such as flag football and ping pong which the college students compete against each other. You could spend time in the Commons room in the arts building hanging out with friends or you could just relax by their pond. Am learning a lot Being a two year college, I was
